snippet: A sampler of oddities, stray thoughts and ephemera from TV 2012 illustrates just how head-spinning the medium can be.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger's roundup of year's television programs samples noteworthy oddities, stray thoughts and ephemera that point out breadth and bizarreness of medium.
lead_paragraph: A sampler of oddities, stray thoughts and ephemera from TV 2012 illustrates just how head-spinning the medium can be.

headline.seo: Neil Genzlinger on TV’s Missed Opportunities in 2012
headline.main: Dubious Ideas, and Hybrids That Got Away
headline.print_headline: Dubious Ideas, And Hybrids That Got Away
